com.checkout

Class CheckoutKit

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.checkout.CheckoutKit

  • public class CheckoutKit
extends java.lang.Object
    Main class allowing to create one CheckoutKit instance, provide the merchant's public key and create card tokens Created by manonh on 30/07/2015.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  CheckoutKit.Environment
      Enum containing the different environments for generating the tokens, it contains the URL corresponding to the environment

                               throws CheckoutException

        Parameters:

        baseUrl - : Environment object containing the desired environment (overwrites SANDBOX as the default one)

      • getInstance

        public static CheckoutKit getInstance()
                               throws CheckoutException
        Function used for the Singleton Pattern, returns a unique CheckoutKit instance, to be used once the CheckoutKit object has been instantiated to retrieve it
        Returns:
        null if getInstance has not been called before specifying all the parameters or the CheckoutKit object
        Throws:
        CheckoutException - : if the CheckoutKit object has not been instantiated before

      • getCardProviders

        public Response<CardProviderResponse> getCardProviders()
                                                throws CheckoutException,
                                                       java.io.IOException
        Function that calls getCardProviders via REST on the server specified in Environment
        Returns:
        : CardProvider array containing the Checkout card providers
        Throws:
        CheckoutException - : if any problem occurred in the communication with the server or if the public key is not valid
        java.io.IOException

      • createCardToken

        public Response<CardTokenResponse> createCardToken(Card card)
                                            throws CheckoutException,
                                                   java.io.IOException
        Function that calls createCardToken via REST on the server specified in Environment
        Parameters:
        card - : Card object containing the informations to be tokenized
        Returns:
        : CardToken object containing all the information received by the server
        Throws:
        CheckoutException - : if any problem occurred in the communication with the server or if the public key is not valid
        java.io.IOException
